metadata.synopsis: Wyll's Romance scene in Act 2. The player gets to dance with Wyll
metadata.how_to_trigger: - recruit Wyll; - go to act2;- reach haven;- have approval >10 (use origin debug book to setup wyll act2 romance scene)-  long rest;

73.text: Nice form. Where'd you learn to dance like that?
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches Wyll. Wyll is practing his dance moves, oblivious to the player's presence, lost in his reverie.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Nice form. Where'd you learn to dance like that?
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll does a few more turns and steps, than faces the player and smiles.

0.text: I've attended my share of fancy balls and masquerades. A few elegant moves can turn all the right heads.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll does a few more turns and steps, than faces the player and smiles.

108.speaker: Wyll
108.text: I've attended my share of fancy balls and masquerades. A few elegant moves can turn all the right heads.

150.speaker: Wyll
150.text: Figured it was time to brush up on my skills. I wouldn't want to fail my new partner.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Stay quiet, and watch Wyll dance.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll conintues dancing, unware of the player, then is startled to see player standing in front of him and stops.

167.speaker: Wyll
167.text: Oh! Sorry. I didn't see you standing there. Lost in the steps, truth be told.
167.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll conintues dancing, unware of the player, then is startled to see player standing in front of him and stops.

160.speaker: Wyll
160.text: I need them to be just right. I wouldn't want to fail my new partner.
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: A new partner? And who might that be?
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

13.speaker: Wyll
13.text: As luck would have it, they just arrived.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

77.speaker: Wyll
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bowing, holding out his hand offering to dance.

154.speaker: Player
154.text: I'd like to, but I'm afraid I'll trip over my own feet.

50.speaker: Wyll
50.text: Don't worry. It's not really about the dance. It's about who's we're dancing with.

131.speaker: Wyll
131.text: Are you sure? I've been rehearsing, you know. I'd hate to put all that effort to waste.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Dance with a devil? Most certainly not.
113.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Cocky, don't you think? Threaten my life, then try to cosy up after?
96.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

151.speaker: Wyll
151.text: I deserve that. And I wish I could give more than 'sorry's in return.
151.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

166.speaker: Wyll
166.text: But I count you as a friend. My closest, in all honesty. Please - dance with me. If we must burn with the Hells' fires, let us burn together.
166.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

59.speaker: Player
59.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

142.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stomps, assuming a paso doble stance. Perfect lines. Intense. He takes a few rhythmic steps foward, playfully invading the player's space while maintaining eye contact.

123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player performs a simple dance move and smiles at Wyll.

14.speaker: Player
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player performs a simple dance move and smiles at Wyll.

104.speaker: Wyll
104.text: Ha ha - ahem. Don't you worry. It takes years to master the Vollante.
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player performs a simple dance move and smiles at Wyll.

92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player performs a simple dance move and smiles at Wyll.

68.text: Ha ha - ahem. Don't you worry. It takes years to master the Vollante.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player attempts a dance move but trips a bit, then smiles at Wyll

63.text: Ha ha - ahem. Don't you worry. It takes years to master the Vollante.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player attempts a dance move but trips a bit, then smiles at Wyll

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: Ha ha - ahem. Don't you worry. It takes years to master the Vollante.
2.context: NodeContext: voh-LAHNT. (A dance I made up.) Wyll is gently amused that the player fell when dancing.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: You're a beautiful dancer. I'm sure you'll teach me in no time.

168.speaker: Wyll
168.text: I'll show you everything I know, and then some - I promise.

117.speaker: Wyll
117.text: But perhaps we might try a more intimate style.

86.speaker: Wyll
86.text: Don't you worry, you were a joy to witness. But perhaps we might try a more intimate style.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Well, not all of us were born with silver spoons in our mouths.

98.speaker: Wyll
98.text: Fair enough. Perhaps a less energetic style would suit you better.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Gather your strength and leap into the air.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps gracefully into the air and lands with aplomb.

138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps gracefully into the air and lands with aplomb.

78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps gracefully into the air and lands with aplomb.

16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player bows and Wyll smiles as he looks on.

41.speaker: Wyll
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player bows and Wyll smiles as he looks on.

171.speaker: Player
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player bows and Wyll smiles as he looks on.

54.text: Now perhaps we might try a more - intimate style.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player bows and Wyll smiles as he looks on.

15.speaker: Wyll
15.text: Now perhaps we might try a more - intimate style.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll begins a slower dance and the player follows suit.

116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll begins a slower dance and the player follows suit.

18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The players come closer together until their lips are a hair away of touching.

48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

102.speaker: Wyll
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

82.speaker: Player
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: So much shadow around us. To think I almost missed the light.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

119.text: So much shadow around us. To think I almost missed the light.
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

75.text: So much shadow around us. To think I almost missed the light.

139.speaker: Wyll
139.text: So much shadow around us. To think I almost missed the light.

51.speaker: Wyll
51.text: Well - it's getting late. We can't face the morrow if we don't bid farewell to the now.
51.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I was hoping we might spend the night... together.
31.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

88.speaker: Wyll
88.text: I'm tempted, trust me. I thought my heart might burst with every step.
88.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

122.speaker: Wyll
122.text: But I still keep faith in the old tales of love, the once-upon-a-times and the happily-ever-afters.
122.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

103.speaker: Wyll
103.text: I'd like to do this the proper way. The way of the old romances sung by the bards.
103.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

136.speaker: Wyll
136.text: Till next time, good night - and dream sweetly.
136.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll smiles, turns, and walks away.

45.speaker: Player
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll - he kisses back, then pulls away.

130.text: *Sigh.* I've drunk wines from Daggerford to Cormyr, but I've never known a taste as rich as yours.
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll - he kisses back, then pulls away.

43.speaker: Wyll
43.text: *Sigh.* I've drunk wines from Daggerford to Cormyr, but I've never known a taste as rich as yours.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll smiles after your kiss.

141.speaker: Wyll
141.text: Gods damn it. You almost make me forget myself.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll turns and walks away, looks back as though he wants to say something, then turns back around and leaves the player on their own.

25.speaker: Wyll
25.text: Good night. And thank you. For the dance, I mean. I won't forget it.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll turns and walks away, looks back as though he wants to say something, then turns back around and leaves the player on their own.

56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll turns and walks away, looks back as though he wants to say something, then turns back around and leaves the player on their own.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Invite him closer with a knowing look - it's what you both want.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pushes his lips against the player's, then pulls away.

148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pushes his lips against the player's, then pulls away.

97.speaker: Player
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and the player step away from each other. After an awkward moment, he smiles.

55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and the player step away from each other. After an awkward moment, he smiles.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: This has gone too far. I should take my leave.

112.speaker: Wyll
112.text: I mean - yes, of course. The sun only rests for so long.

137.speaker: Wyll
137.text: Thank you. For the dance, I mean. I won't forget it.

47.speaker: Wyll
47.text: I'd burn you if I kissed you now, Wyll. No matter how much I want to.

20.speaker: Wyll
20.text: I'd burn you if I kissed you now, Wyll. No matter how much I want to.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I'd burn you if I kissed you now, Wyll. No matter how much I want to.

94.speaker: Wyll
94.text: Forgive me. I was... caught up in the moment. But look - not a cinder on me.

5.speaker: Wyll
5.text: You have more control than you give yourself credit for.

99.speaker: Wyll
99.text: No need to be modest, you were a delight to behold.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: It wasn't hard. You just make it look hard.

79.speaker: Wyll
79.text: Indeed? Well let's see how you fare with a more - intimate style.

145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps into the air, but then stumbles, rights themselves, and smiles at Wyll.

121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps into the air, but then stumbles, rights themselves, and smiles at Wyll.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Twirl about with flair and abandon.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a fun but expertless twirl and smiles at Wyll.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Twirl about with flair and abandon.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a fun but expertless twirl and smiles at Wyll.

163.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a fun but expertless twirl and smiles at Wyll.

83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a fun but expertless twirl and smiles at Wyll.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Beats all that fancy flitting around you were doing.

173.speaker: Wyll
173.text: Does it now? Then let's see how you fare with a less - energetic style.

69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player starts to twirl but then stumbles and takes a moment to straighten themselves out.

72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player starts to twirl but then stumbles and takes a moment to straighten themselves out.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: Give a twirl. A calm twirl.
161.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stands and takes a normal position.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: Stay still and shake your head.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stands and takes a normal position.

6.text: Bashful tonight, are we? Perhaps you will take to a more - relaxed style.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stands and takes a normal position.

23.speaker: Wyll
23.text: Bashful tonight, are we? Perhaps you will take to a more - relaxed style.

110.speaker: Player
110.text: I don't know. I'm not much of a dancer.

21.speaker: Wyll
21.text: You don't have to be. Just follow my lead.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Sorry, but it's a firm 'no' on this one.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I think we should just call it a day.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll takes the hint, this dance is not going to happen. He straightens himself.

107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll takes the hint, this dance is not going to happen. He straightens himself.

3.speaker: Wyll
3.text: Wyll, I'd love nothing more than to dance with you. But I fear I'd burn you to a crisp.

140.speaker: Wyll
140.text: Wyll, I'd love nothing more than to dance with you. But I fear I'd burn you to a crisp.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Wyll, I'd love nothing more than to dance with you. But I fear I'd burn you to a crisp.

124.speaker: Wyll
124.text: About that. You only burn hottest when your emotions are aflare, right? Anger, excitement, fear... but a dance can be meditative. Calming.

170.speaker: Wyll
170.text: If you think you can put your hand in mine without singeing it off, I'm willing to try.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: I could try. If you're up for it.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: I'm surprised you'd ask. Thought maybe a part of you was still suspicious of me.

134.speaker: Wyll
134.text: You've more than proven just how wrong I was about you. I'd make the same decision a thousand times, even knowing the consequences.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: As charming as that sounds, I don't want to give you the wrong impression.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Trust me. I don't think you could fail anyone if you tried.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

100.speaker: Wyll
100.text: I know a few people who might beg to differ. But the only one that matters is here with me now.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: Keep practising. I'm sure you'll get better... eventually...
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

129.speaker: Wyll
129.text: Maybe. But I'm not so keen to perform solo. A duet's always been more my style. Which is to say -
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

133.speaker: Player
133.text: It's like watching a beached flounder flop back to the sea. Is that the idea?

36.speaker: Wyll
36.text: Oh goodness. Is it all that bad? I'm dreadfully out of practise.

64.speaker: Wyll
64.text: No better time to brush up on my skills, then. It would do me no good to fail my new partner.
